description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Zucchini, Goat's Cheese & Mint Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Zucchini,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Chargrilled Zucchini, Goat's Cheese & Mint Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Brush zucchini with oil and season. Chargrill for 2 minutes each side or until charred and tender.
Spoon pasta sauce over cooked glutenfree pizza base and spread evenly with the back of a large spoon. Top with zucchini, cheese, mint and lemon zest. Serve immediately.
